thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 07 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Everbridge Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Everbridge Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.17
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Everbridge Inc:
* EVERBRIDGE ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.17
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.43 * Q1 REVENUE $30.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $29.6 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.20 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.50 TO $0.49 * SEES Q2 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.23 TO $0.22
* SEES FY 2018 TOTAL REVENUE $138.7 MILLION TO $139.8 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $1.58 TO $1.54 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.59 TO $0.57
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16, REVENUE VIEW $32.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.59, REVENUE VIEW $136.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
